artist: Author: Frank Jackson , et al.; Publisher: Hooligan Press, London
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and photographic image of a squatter demonstration in front of a large mural printed in offset lithography on coated paper covers; 34 pp.
title: Squatting in West Berlin
